title: Drawing, "Sketches from Mount Desert, Maine", July 1850
medium: Black and white crayon on light olivish paper
markings: Recto:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Top of tree one mass of light [ inserted above the line] green cones / Aug 1850 / Mt Desert; and again with pencil scratching diagonally across upper right corner.
description: Horizontal view of showing on right half an evergreen shown obliquely growing near the shore of the sea with a dwelling and a lighthouse shown vertically at center left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from Mount Desert, Maine", July 1850.
July 1850. Black and white crayon on light olivish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-16.
